record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - December 10, 2008)

[Page: H10906]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on the resolution just considered by the House.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
